content: Dr. Minkoff is a medical doctor who runs a large natural medicine clinic in Florida, and specializes in treating people with unsolved medical problems such as Lyme, cancer, autoimmune disease and central nervous system disease. He also owns a nutrition company called Body Health, which produces high-quality nutritional products. He also is an Ironman athlete and has done 43 of them. He believes that age is not a barrier to being active and engaged and that people should be smarter and more financially secure at 60 than they were at 40. He also believes that they can make a bigger impact and help more people. Dr. Minkoff also believes that blood flow restriction training or occlusion training is a great way to build muscle and strength, especially for older people or those who are intimidated by heavy weights. He also believes that hormone release is an incredible thing for people and that blood flow restriction training can be done with light weights, and will still produce a response.
